Detection of suspicious network traffic.Data: Zeek conn.log, Zeek icmp.log, Zeek udp.log
Detection of suspicious network traffic.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log, icmp.log, and udp.log for connections using these protocols to external destinations. Filter for unusual byte counts, payload sizes, or patterns that deviate from normal network behavior. Use frequency analysis on connection parameters to identify outliers.

Identification of uncommon data flows or.Action: Examine Zeek conn.log and weird.log for connections using unexpected non-application layer protocols or exhibiting anomalous data flows (e.g., unexpected sender-receiver data ratios, unusual packet content signatures). Use correlation analysis to link these unusual flows with specific source/destination IPs or timeframes.
